journal-title-group.journal-title: The Journal of English and Germanic Philology

title-group.article-title: "The Lesser Faith": Hope and Reversal in Tennyson's In Memoriam"

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1979 Board of Trustees of the University of Illinois
